timeline.message: Column removed.  Time to run tests.

timeline.bodyText:
A couple of thoughts here:

We should probably rename this method to reflect its new criteria
Created doesn't have an index and it's being used as the primary search criteria - Obviously we don't expect this table to grow too big but we also know it does for some people.. I'd be inclined to create a new index on that column
timeline.author: jamesagnew
